    Game class

    Game logic of both modes, single and 2 player.

    1.0

        private int[] one_player(int player_id,
                         Datagram com,
                         boolean isSP,
                         java.lang.String clientNumber)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Single player game mode.
        Parameters:
        player_id - player's id
        com - the socket used for the communications
        isSP - gamemode
        clientNumber - to identify clients on the log
        Returns:
        player points + id in case of single player, otherwise null or -1
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - e
